go-mod-sync: find . -maxdepth 4 -type f -name go.mod -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && echo mod '{}' && go mod tidy"
scripts.build: find . -maxdepth 4 -type f -name go.mod -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && echo build '{}' && go build -v ./..."
scripts.lint: find . -maxdepth 4 -type f -name go.mod -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && echo lint '{}' && golangci-lint run --fix --timeout 300s"
scripts.fmt: find . -maxdepth 4 -type f -name go.mod -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && echo fmt '{}' && go fmt ./..."
scripts.test: find . -maxdepth 4 -type f -name go.mod -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && echo test '{}' && go test -race -cover -v ./..."
